name: Korean Driver License Number Pattern 1 (Optional Separators)
description: Korean driver license number Pattern 1 with optional separators: XX-XXXXXX-XX, XX XXXXXX XX, or XXXXXXXXXX

name: Korean Driver License Number Pattern 2 (Optional Separators)
